PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Besides the high hole mobility , the blend also presented high electron mobility in range of 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ( see Figure S7 ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the entities related to "Property Value":

1. Hole mobility: This is the value of the hole mobility of the blend, which is mentioned as "high" and has a value of 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1.
2. Electron mobility: This is the value of the electron mobility of the blend, which is also mentioned in the paragraph as being in the range of 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1.
3. Figure S7: This is a reference to a figure in the supporting information (Figure S7) that provides more detail on the electron and hole mobility of the blend.

Therefore, the three entities related to "Property Value" in the given paragraph are:

1. Hole mobility
2. Electron mobility
3. Figure S7
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities related to "Property Value" in the given paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. Hole mobility: This is the value of the hole mobility of the blend, which is mentioned as "high" and has a value of 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1.
2. Electron mobility: This is the value of the electron mobility of the blend, which is also mentioned in the paragraph as being in the range of 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high hole mobility |
| 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
